greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Define b(n) = ( (n-1)*(n^2-3*n+1)*b(n-1) - (n-2)^3*b(n-2) )/(n*(n-3)); b(2) = b(3) = 1; sequence gives denominators of b(n).
link: H. S. Wilf, Problem 10578, Amer. Math. Monthly, 104 (1997), 270.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
